## GitHub Workflows Badge

**GitHub 官方徽章，显示你的 GitHub 仓库中正在运行的工作流状态。**

[![ref-official-doc]](https://docs.github.com/zh/actions/monitoring-and-troubleshooting-workflows/monitoring-workflows/adding-a-workflow-status-badge)

### 参数

<details >
<summary><small>点击显示/关闭参数</small></summary><p></p>

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 参数描述 | 更多描述 |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `owner` | `string` | `true` |  | 用户名 |  |
| `repo` | `string` | `true` |  | 仓库名 |  |
| `workflowFile` | `string` | `true` |  | 工作流文件名 |  |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `branch` | `string` |  |  | 项目分支名 |  |
| `event` | `string` |  |  | 工作流触发事件名 |  |

</details>

```txt
https://github.com/github/{owner}/{repo}/workflows/{workflowFile}/badge.svg{?branch,event}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/回到顶部-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### 示例

```markdown
<!-- xiaohuohumax/readme-widget-hub -->
![Workflow Status](https://github.com/xiaohuohumax/readme-widget-hub/actions/workflows/build-readme.yaml/badge.svg)
```
